entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Evaluate opportunities for slowing down the rate at which threads are released in the thread pool, informed by feedback criteria #93265
    9.0.0
  • ARM64: Suboptimal codegen for addressing modes #93263
    9.0.0
  • Jitted Methods Counting Test Fails When Hardware Intrinsics are Disabled #93261
    9.0.0
  • LSRA: Add stress mode to force move argument registers to different registers #93257
    9.0.0
  • RequestDuration_EnrichmentHandler_Success_Recorded fails with System.Net.Quic.QuicException : Stream aborted by peer #93250
  • JIT: Unroll GT_BLK via two regs instead of one #93249
    9.0.0
  • [ILLink]: Using InternalsVisibleTo in System.Private.CoreLib breaks a runtime build #93247
  • JIT: use reverse post-order (RPO) traversal for morph #93246
    9.0.0
  • RyuJIT: Implement mitigation for Intel JCC erratum #93243
    9.0.0
  • SerialPort.GetPortNames not handling poor registry data #93240
  • LINQ Groupby has no memory efficient implementation #93237
  • Apply `[ExcludeFromCodeCoverage]` to generated code #93236
  • Reduce the limit of simultaneous spin-waiters in the thread pool #93234
    9.0.0
  • R2RDumpTests failing under gcstress with "App Exit Code: 259" #93233
    9.0.0
  • [gcstress] LoadVector128x2SByte fails under gcstress #93230
    9.0.0
  • Microsoft.Gen.OptionsValidation.Test.EmitterTests.TestEmitter fails occasionally #93229
  • Reading file on an Kubernetes NFS volume with dotnet 6 application freezes thread #93227
  • Light up IndexOfAnyAsciiSearcher for AVX512 #93222
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Mitigate the sources of privacy and compliance issues by providing and using safe-to-log URIs and safe-to-log exceptions #93221
  • [API Proposal]: Vectorized span-processing helpers #93217
    9.0.0
  • [Android] Timezone APIs on Android #93216
  • DotNet6.0 - Incorrect DateTimeFormat for CultureInfo #93215
    Future
  • JIT: Add a stress mode to randomly reorder LIR #93212
    Future
  • JIT: Audit HW intrinsic lowering code for LIR ordering #93211
    9.0.0
  • High number of connections waiting for SSL handshake #93208
  • Slow flock on nfs file share #93207
  • Segmentation fault in System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests #93206
    9.0.0
  • aspnet app crash with core dump when using 7.0.11-bookworm-slim docker image (debian 12) #93205
  • SSL Stress Connection Refused Linux #93204
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization investigate/implement NSCalendarIdentifier not implemented calendars #93199
    Future
  • Intel architecture improvements for .NET 9 #93196
    9.0.0
  • Test failure Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.WindowsServiceLifetimeTests.ServiceSequenceIsCorrect #93194

Closed

  • Debugger fails to attach to a specific application with CORDBG_E_MISSING_DEBUGGER_EXPORTS on macOS. #72603
    9.0.0
  • Assembly.Location is sometimes corrupted on .NET 8 #93127
    8.0.0
  • Test failure readytorun/JittedMethodsCountingTest/JittedMethodsCountingTest/JittedMethodsCountingTest.sh #93163
    9.0.0
  • Could not load file or assembly 'em_10 (Blazor hot reload) #93239
  • CS1620 Usage of Unsafe.AsRef(in) no longer working with 8.0 rc1? #93251
  • JIT: LowerHWIntrinsicCreate can create illegal IR #92766
    9.0.0
  • System.GC.Name: "clrgc.dll" not working in docker #93218
    Future
  • Test failure _AdvSimd_Arm64_ro::JIT.HardwareIntrinsics.Arm._AdvSimd.Arm64.Program.LoadVector128x3UShort() #93184
    9.0.0
  • [mono] Reenable Sse2.X64/StoreNonTemporal test #93202
    9.0.0
  • Clean up disabled warnings for Windows msvc Mono build #45245
    9.0.0
  • Http/SslStress builds failing on main #91672
    9.0.0
  • [Mono] Add SIMD support for System.Numerics.Vector2 on Arm64 #73462
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Skip Jitted Methods Counting Test when DOTNET_EnableHWIntrinsic=0 #93264
    test-bug, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [android][ios] Fix dispose problem with NativeHttpHandlers #93262
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Make Emitted Attribute Order Deterministic in Options Source Generator #93260
    area-Extensions-Options, 8.0.0
  • Reference live ILLink analyzer #93259
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • WIP: experimental LoadLibrary monitoring in CoreCLR native runtime #93258
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Rename `server.socket.address` to `network.peer.address` #93255
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Adjust the DNS lookup duration metric #93254
    area-System.Net
  • [release/8.0] Make a copy of assembly path. #93253
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Enable ldp reordering for TYP_FLOAT #93248
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable DotNETRuntimePrivate provider #93245
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Add initial MaxStack calculation #93244
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Sanitize Reg Entries in SerialPort.GetPortNames (Issue 93240) #93242
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Improve tests for exponential trim analysis problems #93232
    test-enhancement, linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink, 9.0.0
  • [MT][browser] Allow CI failures on library MT tests #93224
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono
  • Implement StoreSelectedScalarNx2 for Arm64 #93223
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization use system ICU #93220
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Remove a few unnecessary `unsafe` keyword uses in TensorPrimitives #93219
    needs-area-label
  • [wasm] Make it easy to run blazor startup measurements #93209
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • Add SuppressSingleFileAnalysisWarnings option to ILC and use it in runtime tests #93200
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • TcpReceiveSendGetsCanceledByDispose: update test for change in Linux kernel. #93198
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution
  • Arm64: Implement LoadAndInsertScalar APIs #93197
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation

Merged

  • Make a copy of assembly path. #93238
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Align data in Buffer.Memmove for arm64 #93214
    area-System.Buffers
  • Do not clone empty arrays in CloneByteArray #93231
    area-System.Security, 9.0.0
  • Fix old gcc build #91845
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0-staging] Fix a memory leak in runtime interop stubs when using an array of structs of types that use old-style managed marshalers #93148
    Servicing-approved, area-Interop-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Fix a memory leak in runtime interop stubs when using an array of structs of types that use old-style managed marshalers #93147
    Servicing-approved, area-Interop-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Make thread pool thread timeouts configurable #92985
    area-System.Threading, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Add support for byte/sbyte SIMD multiplication on XArch #86811
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Fix LowerHWIntrinsicCreate LIR ordering issues #93210
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • SPMI: Fix 'misses' fraction computation and calculate total contexts correctly #93179
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update some artifact names that were recently changed #93213
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Update APICompat suppression files to ignore TFMs #93129
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Use isRollingBuild variable instead of removed isFullMatrix in pipelines #93201
    area-Infrastructure
  • Doc fix-ups to InstrumentRule #92035
    area-Extensions-Primitives, needs-area-label
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization implement japanese calendar data #92471
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Microsoft.Extensions.FileSystemGlobbing PACKAGE.md #93123
    area-Extensions-FileSystem, community-contribution
  • [mono] Reenable Sse2.X64/StoreNonTemporal tests #93203
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Revert part of 93092 since it causes a regression when aot-ing corlib. #93195
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [mono] Reenable MSVC warnings #92895
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [HTTP/SSL] Fix stress #93135
    area-System.Net
  • [mono] Remove coree/mixed-mode support #93153
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • System.Formats.Cbor package's readme #93021
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [Mono] Enable intrinsics support for multiplication and division for Vector2/4 by scalar + refactor #93061
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono

Updated

  • Add missing readonly modifiers to GCHandle and DependentHandle #93178
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, community-contribution
  • JIT: Make BasicBlock jump target private #93152
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [8.0] Make thread pool thread timeouts configurable #92986
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Threading, 8.0.0
  • [7.0] Make thread pool thread timeouts configurable #92987
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Threading, 7.0.x
  • [6.0] Make thread pool thread timeouts configurable #92988
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Threading, 6.0.x
  • Fix Decimal literal formatting in source generators #93160
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • [release/8.0] Handle binding to initialized abstract members #93120
    Servicing-consider, area-Extensions-Configuration
  • WIP: [ios][tests] Trim on helix for libraries and functional tests on CI #92719
    needs-area-label
  • Fix Unnecessary sign-extension for `(nuint)span.Length` #88136
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement Interlocked for small types. #92974
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Added 'standalone' option when building tests for ilasm roundtrip #93037
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix a memory leak in runtime interop stubs when using an array of structs of types that use old-style managed marshalers #93089
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] Fix a memory leak in runtime interop stubs when using an array of structs of types that use old-style managed marshalers #93150
    Servicing-approved, area-Interop-coreclr
  • Add missing ArrayPool returns to failure branches #92511
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Light up String.Manipulation APIs with Vector512 codepath #93043
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Adding AVX512 path to Base64 encoding/Decoding #92241
    area-System.Buffers, community-contribution, arch-avx512, 9.0.0
  • Obsolete `AuthenticationManager` of `System.Net.Requests` #93171
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [browser] drop `create_task_callback` and `mono_wasm_marshal_promise` #93010
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Use Sync Send methods in Sync HttpClient tests #93139
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [mono][infra] Enable linux-x64 Mono fullAOT llvm job on extra platforms #92057
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • [QUIC] Cleaned up TlsSecret and added test. #93119
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [release/8.0] Fix Options Source Gen Trimming Issues #93193
    Servicing-consider, area-Extensions-Options, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Fix max chunk size limiting #81607
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • JIT: Substitute constant into loop testing variable where possible #90622
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Mono] Enable IL trim for WASM apps by default #90436
    area-Build-mono
  • Use highest thread priority in linux #89848
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 9.0.0
  • [mono][amd64] Pass SIMD arguments in SIMD registers. #93182
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Expose a `Lock` type in preview mode #87672
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Add tests for all possible types of negative arguments #93058
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • ECMA335 NaN encoding test fix #93121
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Fixes not find assembly and pdb if it's not using the default path #92955
    Servicing-consider, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.x
  • [mono][wasm] Use [UnmanagedCallersOnly] in GetDelegateForFunctionPoin… #89334
    area-Interop-mono, 9.0.0
  • Ability to request stackwalk per EventPipe session #84077
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 117.0.5938.149, windows: 118.0.5993.54 #93183
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add package readmes (continued) #92228
    area-Meta, help wanted, 9.0.0
  • Add an additional length check to FrozenDictionary and FrozenSet #92546
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • [browser][MT] running tests in a "sidecar" thread #92226
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Fix regressed file sizes for blazor #92664
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Improve the help message in build.ps1 #92192
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [System.HashCode] Adjust nullable annotation on generic Add method which accepts IEqualityComparer #91905
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Improve literal-after-loop regex optimization #93190
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 9.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-09
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Question: Does dotnet/runtimelab want to host WIT code gen issues #2409

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-09
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Provide well defined bahvior for `--` #35952

Updated

  • Re-enable EndToEnd_NoAPI_Web test #33858
  • SDK resolver failure when an older SDK is also installed #35334
    Discussion
  • Use `packages.lock.json` instead of `project.assets.json`, if available #35556
  • Failing to publish self-contained app to `linux-bionic-arm64` #35518
  • Specifying a framework for multi-targeted dependencies that include a .NET Framework target does not work. #35341
  • [Bug]: ProjectReference not transitive during "Pack" on multi-targeted project #35567
  • [8.0.100-rc.2.23469.4] some deprecated global tools get NuGetPackageNotFoundException when installing #35566
  • Microsoft.NET.RuntimeIdentifierInference.targets incorrectly sets RID to win7-x86 / win7-x64 #35575
    8.0.2xx
  • Merge installer repo into SDK #24415
    Backlog
  • Support for SxS workload manifests #32236
    8.0.1xx
  • Running dotnet build in Simplified Chinese environment may result in garbled code #35473
  • RuntimeIdentifiers `osx.11.0-arm64`, `osx.12-arm64` and `osx.13-arm64` are no longer recognized in .NET 8 RC1 #35516
    Discussion
  • .NET8 RC1 dotnet tool install <package> does not work when nuget.org is blocked #35517
  • `donet watch` fails on rebuilt with locked source generator dll (net8) #35607
  • `dotnet watch` silently fails when `launchSettings.json` contains comments #35558
  • NuGet.Build.Tasks.Pack.targets: Could not find a part of path #35738
  • dotnet publish fails on indirectly referenced "Microsoft.NET.Sdk.Web"-project #35656
  • Container tooling generates invalid application image when used with an OCI base image #35608
  • dotnet publish does not support DotNetPublishFiles #35581
  • restore failing on Alpine arm32 #35676
  • Native AOT publish ignores `DebugType=portable` #35798
  • Test projects do not automatically select a RuntimeIdentifier, breaking use of native libraries #35792
  • ResolvePackageFileConflicts task's Analyzer resolution breaks Roslyn analyzer dependency isolation #35739
  • `ProjectReference` does not import build.props/build.targets to like `PackageReference` does #35704
  • NETSDK1202 should be a warning and not an error to prevent breaking extant libaries #35811
    Discussion
  • Net 8.0 RC During build System.Text.Json NuGet isn't copied to bin folder (in net 7.0 its still copied) #35816
    Discussion
  • CopyLocalLockFileAssemblies not respected in 8.0.100-rc.1.23463.5 #35817
  • AnalysisLevel `preview` is broken #35932
  • PublishCompressionFormats is not used during dotnet pack #35889
  • Containers: detection of port config should prefer ASPNETCORE_URLS #35845
  • Provide feed details when erroring on unauthorized feed #35842
  • [NETSDKE2E]Duplicate workload version info displays in dotnet --info of NET8 RTM SDK #35920
  • dotnet watch for WASM projects restart does not work #35930
  • Question: Offline self contained publish, what nuget packages? #35950
  • Runtime for migration bundle creation in Net7 #30466
  • Make mistyping errors gentler #17005
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Switch to the svc pool for 7.0.4xx #35948
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add .gitignore to exclude files generated by test #35940
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [#17005] Make Mistyping Errors Gentler #35939
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 20.4.0 to 22.1.2 in /eng/dependabot #35936
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 20.4.0 to 22.1.2 in /eng/dependabot #35935
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: main

Merged

  • [release/8.0.1xx] APICompat - Use compatible assembly references #35924
    Servicing-approved, Area-ApiCompat, 8.0.1xx

Updated

  • Workload manifest updater cleanup #35859
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Allow Worker SDK projects to invoke Publish Profile-derived targets #35794
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK
  • Update the sdk target to net9.0 #35031
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #35914
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add dotnet package search command #35742
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-09
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [Proposal]: ReadOnlySpan initialization from static data #5295
    Likely Never
  • Expand lambdas and method body definitions to allow any block like statements #6887
  • [API Proposal]: linq "from" clause without "on" #7584

Updated

  • Simple encoding of unions in C# #7544
  • Make the interface support implicit operators? #7588
  • `is` expression evaluating `const` expression should be considered constant #6926
    Any Time
  • Require await to apply nullable postconditions to task-returning calls #6888
    Needs More Work
  • [Proposal]: Add `private` and `namespace` accessibility modifiers for top-level types. #6794
    Working Set
  • Proposal: CallerCharacterNumberAttribute #3992
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: Make generated `Program` for top-level statements public by default #6769
    Needs More Work
  • Proposal: list-patterns on enumerables #6574
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: Embedded Language Indicators for raw string literals #6247
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Create spec for const expressions for is patterns #7589

Updated

  • Add proposal for partial type inference #7582

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • When a variable initializer has incompatible type, the editor should offer to change the variable's type to match the expression type #70306
  • C# doesn't allow for methods with optional `System.Half` parameters #70300
  • Pressing enter key when creating switch expression forces variable and braces on 1 line #70294
    17.9
  • Edit history changes when renaming a symbol #70293
    17.9

Closed

  • EnC fails in method containing await foreach #69805
    17.8

PullRequests

Created

  • Improve performance on SymbolCompletionProviderTests #70307
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Add line continuation tests for string concatenation #70305
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add support to the LSIF generator for document symbols #70304
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Reduce scope of banned API suppressions to only what is necessary #70303
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • WIP: Seeing what breaks. #70302
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Small bits of cleanup in sync'ing code. #70301
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove hello service #70298
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Replace Roslyn.Utilities.IReadOnlySet with System.Collections.Generic.IReadOnlySet #70297
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • WIP: For testing purposes only. #70296
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Preserve existing formatting when fully qualifying names #70295
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Make a special CodeAnalysis diagnostics refresh request for Run Code Analysis command #70292
    Area-IDE, LSP, untriaged

Merged

  • [17.8] Collection expressions: merge changes for conversions and optimizations #70273
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.8 to main #70308
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Warn if collection expression to ref struct type incurs a heap allocation #70264
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Avoid taking a lock the vast majority of the time in GlobalOptionService.GetOption #70278
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Ask for source generated state up front when getting the compile time solution #70205
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update 'use collection expression' to support cases where an array was assigned to a span type. #70287
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • EnC: Update deleted lambdas to throw MissingMethodException #70184
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: synthesized list types should implement ICollection and IList #70288
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions
  • More tests for an issue around constrained calls #70286
    Area-Compilers, Test, untriaged
  • Avoid infinite cycle caused by an early binding of DefaultParameterValue attribute. #70242
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Send batch events for DiagnosticsUpdatedArgs #70039
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Short-circuit tagger usage of interval tree when tagging complete snapshot #70285
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Handle generic types as parameters of attributes in `MetadataDecoder` #70151
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Restore "Do source-generation only in our OOP process" #70109
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Enable recommender for `scoped` keyword #70290
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Improve default value handling in RDG #51241
  • Perf regression: json #51239
  • Perf improvement: updates #51238
  • [Blazor] Page created in Client project is not discovered from URL in .NET 8 RC1 #51237
  • [Blazor] Hot Reload not working properly when using RenderModeAuto in .NET 8 RC1 #51236
  • BlazorWebView needs a way to enable overriding ResolveComponentForRenderMode #51235
    .NET 9 Planning
  • not working httputility #51234
  • RequestDelegateGenerator intercepts incorrect methods #51233
  • Log when an enhanced navigation fails #51229
    .NET 9 Planning
  • NavigationManager.Refresh throws on SSR-only pages #51222
    8.0.0
  • wwwroot DirectoryNotFound #51219
  • Automatically create OpenApiParameters when using BindAsync in Minimal API #51218
  • NavigationManager.Uri does not update for interactive components on non-interactive routers #51216
    8.0.0
  • Failed to log out user with error "Uncaught TypeError: Cannot read properties of null (reading 'classList')" after publishing Blazor Web Individual App #51215
    8.0.0
  • Perf regression: connectionclose, json #51214
  • Perf improvement: plaintext, plainTextEmptyFilter #51213

Closed

  • DisableAntiforgery has no effect when applied on RouteGroupBuilder #51194
  • User isn't logged in after registering a new user in a Blazor Web App with Identity #51179
  • Logout fails in Blazor Web App with Identity #51180
  • The runtime<->aspnetcore shared src is out of sync #18943
  • Change onclick action in navigation for default template #51230
  • Enhance Blazor Web .reconnect to state whether failures are due to circuit not existing so we can auto-reload page #50979
    8.0.0
  • Upgrade Microsoft.Extensions.Http.Polly to support new Polly.Core #51228
  • Rename the "ASP.NET Core Web App" template to "ASP.NET Core Razor Pages App" #50999
    8.0.0
  • Consolidate Blazor Web App terminology: "Interactive render mode" vs "Interactivity type" vs "hosting model" #51108
    8.0.0
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #51212

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0] Fix disabling anti-forgery check on route groups #51244
    area-networking
  • Add namespace and assembly check before interception #51243
    area-networking
  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Defer enhanced component updates until reconnection circuit completes #51242
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor
  • Update SDK #51240
    area-infrastructure
  • Blazor Web Template Accessibility #51231
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, * NO MERGE *
  • SignOutHttpResult/SignOutResult ctor overloads that take a single authentication scheme #51220
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • QuickGrid static pagination #51217
    area-blazor

Merged

  • Fix pluralization of 'scheme' in doc comments #51206
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 9.0-preview1
  • Fix disabling anti-forgery check on route groups #51232
    area-minimal, 9.0-preview1
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `e47544a` to `2dd1c13` #51186

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Request to back port fix into .NET 7 #17921

  • maui dev ，in android window is ok ,in ios webview <img src=x.png 。not display ,but use remote url is ok ,why ? #17912

  • [Android] Entry.Keyboard == null regression #17899
  • AppThemeBinding interfering with VisualState setters for FlyoutItems #17898
    Backlog

  • Grid ColumnDefinitions not updating #17894

Closed

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • More information in TagWithCallSite #32003
  • Migration bundles directly to a docker container #31999
  • Microsoft.Data.Sqlite with nhibernate - update Schema not working #31998
  • Migrations bundle add a paramter to select the used schema #31997

Closed

  • Insert trigger breaks SaveChanges #31985
  • Treat SQL Server Error Number 1222 as Transient (Lock request time out period exceeded) #31724
    8.0.0
  • When using SqlServerRetryingExecutionStrategy, on retry exception thrown #31000
    8.0.0
  • Table-sharing synthesized concurrency tokens are not created in all cases #29750
    8.0.0
  • NullReferenceException when accessing navigation property with compiled models and ambiguous type names #31977
  • Generated SQL has syntax issue when doing GroupJoin with Union constructed and ordered query #31580
    7.0.0
  • Enforcing usage of FluentAPI instead of attributes #31889
  • Test execution strategies when using System.Transactions #31834
  • Native AOT - Microsoft.Data.SQLite - Statically Link / self contained EXE #31829
  • TPC does not work "out of the box" with Sqlite #31752
  • Data inconsistency while loading entities based on new changed prop before SaveChangesInterceptor.SavingChangesAsync #31741
  • Changing the result after reader executed in a DbCommandInterceptor #31991

PullRequests

Created

  • Add member name param to TagWithCallSite #32002
  • [release/8.0] Fix to #31961 - Projection filtering on second-level reference could not be translated #31996
    Servicing-approved

Merged

  • [release/8.0] Treat SQL Pool warmup/pause errors as transient #31739
    Servicing-approved, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0] Open the connection before creating the DbCommand #31988
    Servicing-approved
  • [release/8.0] Synthesize concurrency tokens for derived tables in TPC and TPT #31979
    Servicing-approved

Updated

  • Fix lock loosing in concurrency detector for multiple contexts on one thread #31891
